entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle and Fog, 1.0°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday: A few showers or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or periods of drizzle. Fog patches. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to periods of snow near midnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM ADT Monday 16 May 2016
